name: CircularFifoQueue_addTest
description: Unit tests for the add functionality of the CircularFifoQueue class.

test_cases.name: testAddElementSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful addition of elements to the CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenFull
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element when the CircularFifoQueue is full.

test_cases.name: testAddNullElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of a null element to the CircularFifoQueue, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWrapAround
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to the CircularFifoQueue when it wraps around after removal.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenQueueIsEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to an empty CircularFifoQueue.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenQueueHasOneElement
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to a CircularFifoQueue with one element.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenQueueHasTwoElements
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to a CircularFifoQueue with two elements.

test_cases.name: testAddElementWhenQueueIsFullAndRemoveIsCalled
test_cases.description: Tests the addition of an element to a full CircularFifoQueue after a removal.
